content: Who composed the famous opera "Carmen" that premiered in 1875?

The famous opera "Carmen" was composed by Georges Bizet. It premiered on March 3, 1875, at the Opéra-Comique in Paris. The libretto was written by Henri Meilhac and Ludovic Halévy, based on a novella of the same name by Prosper Mérimée. Despite initial mixed reviews, "Carmen" has become one of the most popular and frequently performed operas in the world.
